mapper.update: update smms_room_info set RECORDSTATE='1' where ACCESS_ID =#{ACCESS_ID} and ROOM_IDX=#{ROOM_IDX}
mapper.select: select count(*) from SMMS_ROOM_INFO where ACCESS_ID = #{ACCESS_ID} and RECORDSTATE='0'
select count(room_idx) as ROOM_COUNT from smms_room_info where RECORDSTATE='0'

select ssr.ACCESS_ID as access_id, ssr.ROOM_NAME as machine_room_name, ssr.ROOM_IDX as machine_room_idx, ssr.ROOM_ADDRESS as machine_room_place, ssr.ROOM_PROPERTY as machine_room_property, ssr.ROOM_MANAGER as room_manager, ssr.MANAGER_TEL as room_manager_tel, ssr.MANAGER_MOBILE as room_manager_mobile from SMMS_ROOM_INFO as ssr where ssr.RECORDSTATE='0' and ACCESS_ID = #{ACCESS_ID} and ROOM_IDX=#{ROOM_IDX}
mapper.delete: delete from SMMS_ROOM_INFO as ssr where ssr.RID = #{RID}
mapper.select: SELECT ssr.rid as SSRRID, ssr.ROOM_NAME as ROOM_NAME, ssr.ROOM_IDX as ROOM_IDX, ssr.ROOM_ADDRESS as ROOM_ADDRESS FROM smms_web_case as swc left join smms_room_info as ssr on ssr.ACCESS_ID=swc.ACCESS_ID where swc.WEBSITE_URL=#{WEBSITE_URL}
select , sii.IDC_NAME as TRANS_IDC_ID from SMMS_ROOM_INFO as ssr left JOIN smms_idc_info as sii on ssr.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID where ssr.RID = #{RID}
mapper.update: update SMMS_ROOM_INFO as ssr set SSR.RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where ssr.RID=#{RID}
